import React from 'react' import './start.css' export default function Start(props) { return (

Welcome to the Quiz!

Click the button below to start the quiz!

You will play rounds of {props.options.amount} {props.options.amount == 1 ? 'question' : 'questions'} in {props.options.category} category and {props.options.difficulty} difficulty. difficulty (change options)
) }
